description:
Fenny asks Bonobono if he`s been having fun lately. Bonobono says he hasn`t. They meet Raccoon who just got in trouble with his dad, and he says he hasn`t had any fun lately, either. Fenny, Bonobono and Raccoon try to think of the reason they aren`t having fun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Has It Really Been Fun, Lately?
